edu.iastate.cs228.game
Interface GalaxyState

public interface GalaxyState

A static copy of the state of the galaxy.

Method Summary
 SystemState getCurrentSystemFor(Color agentColor)
          Retrieve the state of the system in which the agent of the given color is, if that system is within your agent's scan range.
 SystemState[] getSystems()
          Return all system states scanned.
 

Method Detail

getSystems

SystemState[] getSystems()
Return all system states scanned.

Returns:
Array storing references to each System’s current state.

getCurrentSystemFor

SystemState getCurrentSystemFor(Color agentColor)
Retrieve the state of the system in which the agent of the given color is, if that system is within your agent's scan range.

Parameters:
agentColor - the color of the query agent
Returns:
the SystemState for the system in which the given agent currently is or null if the agent isn't found in the scan
